thread.title: New Report Published: Fanpicks for Fun and Real Money
thread.title_full: New Report Published: Fanpicks for Fun and Real Money

author: prbuzz.com
title: New Report Published: Fanpicks for Fun and Real Money
text:
Fanpicks.com , your one stop for all your fantasy sports needs. Play all your favorite DFS games and your favorite pro and college sports for real money. Making money does not have to be necessarily boring. There are different leagues and contests ranging from daily contests to seasonal contests. Daily contests only last for a day and at the end of the day a winner is declared and the winnings deposited in the account. Participants can play their game of choice with competitors of choice which can range from friends, relatives to even strangers and the public pools. Different leagues all have different prizes to be won which can be in form of cash and tickets to real NFL games among many others.
Wondering how Fanpicks.com works? Very simple, signup and put a valid email address, load your account with whatever amount, visit the sports rooms and choose a tournament of choice among your favorite game. Choose a roster of players and make sure you stay within the allotted salary cap. Sit back and enjoy watching your team play while you get all the live updates from the site. Grading is done after the game by counting the points from the rosters in the competition. Participant with the highest points is declared the winner and awarded the prize. It is that simple, someone of any age can play (considered an adult by the State Laws) and the best part is that it is legal to compete in fantasy sports for real money.
Wondering on how to win in the contests? Just like many other things, consistent practice and research will help you win in the contests. The advantage with Fanpicks is that it has all the updated information that you can use in playing the games. There is also a stats page that will help you in making predictions and thus make the right choice in choosing a roster and a competitor. There is a twitter feed that will always give you the latest news. At Fanpicks there is a venue for practice which can help you in building your skills that you will need in winning the contests.
Gone are the days where playing fantasy sports was expensive. At Fanpicks, one can play for as low as $1, $5, or $10 depending on their budget and they are still eligible to winning great prizes for up to a million dollars. The participantâ€™s money however limits him to a certain salary cap and all through the game they have to stick to the salary cap.
Do not waste anymore time, sign up at www.fanpicks.com to get started. Have fun playing your favorite games and win great prizes. Turn as low as $1 to a whooping $1,000,000 while having fun.
